items.title: ‘I’m fed up’: My selfish mother-in-law has controlled me for 30 years. How can I regain my power?
items.description: “I’m almost 50 years old. Enough is enough. I am exhausted by it.”

items.title: ‘He has become hostile’: My mom is in her 80s and has dementia. My brother is blocking access.
items.description: “Can someone who has not been found legally incompetent, but who has a history of delusions, make decisions regarding property?”

items.title: ‘We never want to think our children would strip us of all our money’: Is it safe to give my kids my Social Security number?
items.description: “Regrettably, I have a good friend whose brother robbed their mother of a significant amount of money before her death.”

items.title: ‘I’m on a fixed budget’: Silver and gold are now too expensive for me. What else can I gift my infant grandchildren?
items.description: “I’ve already listed them as beneficiaries on my 401(k).”

items.title: Warren Buffett gifts us 5 secrets for investing success as he hands off Berkshire Hathaway’s reins
items.description: Three paragraphs in a 1994 letter to Berkshire Hathaway shareholders reveal the top reason for Buffett’s phenomenal winning record.
